item.title: Problems when shaping data
item.description: This article is a memorandum of the processing that I did when the data type I was scraping was various. #Check the data type df['column name'].dtype #DataFrame np.dtype() #numpy array Change data type df['column name'].astype(int) converted to #int df['column name'].dtype(float) converted to #float df['column name'].dtype(str) # convert to string #Check for missing values df.isnull() #Remove missing values df.dropna() #pandas line deletion df.drop (number of lines) Add columns to #pandas
